verses.verse: Now when Jacob <WH3290> saw <WH7200> that there was corn <WH7668> in Egypt, <WH4714> Jacob <WH3290> said <WH559> to his sons, <WH1121> Why <WH4100> do you look <WH7200> one on another?

And he said, <WH559> Behold, <WH2009> I have heard <WH8085> that there is corn <WH7668> in Egypt: <WH4714> get <WH3381> you down <WH3381> thither, <WH8033> and buy <WH7666> for us from there; <WH8033> that we may live, <WH2421> and not die. <WH4191>
And Joseph's <WH3130> ten <WH6235> brothers <WH251> went <WH3381> down <WH3381> to buy <WH7666> corn <WH1250> in Egypt. <WH4714>

But Benjamin, <WH1144> Joseph's <WH3130> brother, <WH251> Jacob <WH3290> sent <WH7971> not with his brothers; <WH251> for he said, <WH559> Lest <WH6435> peradventure mischief <WH611> befall <WH7122> him.
And the sons <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> came <WH935> to buy <WH7666> corn among <WH8432> those that came: <WH935> for the famine <WH7458> was in the land <WH776> of Canaan. <WH3667>

And Joseph <WH3130> was the governor <WH7989> over <WH5921> the land, <WH776> and he it was that sold <WH7666> to all <WH3605> the people <WH5971> of the land: <WH776> and Joseph's <WH3130> brothers <WH251> came, <WH935> and bowed <WH7812> down <WH7812> themselves before him with their faces <WH639> to the earth. <WH776>

And Joseph <WH3130> saw <WH7200> his brothers, <WH251> and he knew <WH5234> them, but made himself strange <WH5234> to them, and spoke <WH1696> roughly <WH7186> to them; and he said <WH559> to them, From where <WH370> come <WH935> you? And they said, <WH559> From the land <WH776> of Canaan <WH3667> to buy <WH7666> food. <WH400>
And Joseph <WH3130> knew <WH5234> his brothers, <WH251> but they knew <WH5234> not him.

And Joseph <WH3130> remembered <WH2142> the dreams <WH2472> which <WH834> he dreamed <WH2492> of them, and said <WH559> to them, You are spies; <WH7270> to see <WH7200> the nakedness <WH6172> of the land <WH776> you are come. <WH935>
And they said <WH559> to him, No, <WH3808> my lord, <WH113> but to buy <WH7666> food <WH400> are your servants <WH5650> come. <WH935>
We are all <WH3605> one <WH259> man's <WH376> sons; <WH1121> we are true <WH3651> men, your servants <WH5650> are no <WH3808> spies. <WH7270>
And he said <WH559> to them, No, <WH3808> but to see <WH7200> the nakedness <WH6172> of the land <WH776> you are come. <WH935>

And they said, <WH559> Your servants <WH5650> are twelve <WH8147> <WH6240> brothers, <WH251> the sons <WH1121> of one <WH259> man <WH376> in the land <WH776> of Canaan; <WH3667> and, behold, <WH2009> the youngest <WH6996> is this day <WH3117> with our father, <WH1> and one <WH259> is not.
And Joseph <WH3130> said <WH559> to them, That is it that I spoke <WH1696> to you, saying, <WH559> You are spies: <WH7270>

Hereby <WH2063> you shall be proved: <WH974> By the life <WH2416> of Pharaoh <WH6547> you shall not go <WH3318> forth <WH3318> hence, <WH2088> except <WH518> your youngest <WH6996> brother <WH251> come <WH935> here.

Send <WH7971> one <WH259> of you, and let him fetch <WH3947> your brother, <WH251> and you shall be kept <WH631> in prison, that your words <WH1697> may be proved, <WH974> whether there be any truth <WH571> in you: or else <WH518> <WH3808> by the life <WH2416> of Pharaoh <WH6547> surely you are spies. <WH7270>
And he put <WH622> them all <WH622> together into <WH413> ward <WH4929> three <WH7969> days. <WH3117>
And Joseph <WH3130> said <WH559> to them the third <WH7992> day, <WH3117> This <WH2063> do, <WH6213> and live; <WH2421> for I fear <WH3373> God: <WH430>

If <WH518> you be true <WH3651> men, let one <WH259> of your brothers <WH251> be bound <WH631> in the house <WH1004> of your prison: <WH4929> go <WH3212> you, carry <WH935> corn <WH7668> for the famine <WH7459> of your houses: <WH1004>
But bring <WH935> your youngest <WH6996> brother <WH251> to me; so shall your words <WH1697> be verified, <WH539> and you shall not die. <WH4191> And they did <WH6213> so. <WH3651>

And they said <WH559> one <WH376> to another, <WH251> We are truly <WH61> guilty <WH816> concerning <WH5921> our brother, <WH251> in that we saw <WH7200> the anguish <WH6869> of his soul, <WH5315> when he sought <WH2603> us, and we would not hear; <WH8085> therefore <WH5921> <WH3651> is this <WH2063> distress <WH6869> come <WH935> on us.

And Reuben <WH7205> answered <WH6030> them, saying, <WH559> Spoke <WH559> I not to you, saying, <WH559> Do not sin <WH2398> against the child; <WH3206> and you would not hear? <WH8085> therefore, <WH1571> behold, <WH2009> also <WH1571> his blood <WH1818> is required. <WH1875>
And they knew <WH3045> not that Joseph <WH3130> understood <WH8085> them; for he spoke to them by an interpreter. <WH3887>

And he turned <WH5437> himself about from them, and wept; <WH1058> and returned <WH7725> to them again, <WH7725> and communed <WH1696> with them, and took <WH3947> from them Simeon, <WH8095> and bound <WH631> him before their eyes. <WH5869>

Then Joseph <WH3130> commanded <WH6680> to fill <WH4390> their sacks <WH8242> with corn, <WH1250> and to restore <WH7725> every man's <WH376> money <WH3701> into <WH413> his sack, <WH8242> and to give <WH5414> them provision <WH6720> for the way: <WH1870> and thus <WH3651> did <WH6213> he to them.
And they laded <WH5375> their asses <WH2543> with the corn, <WH7668> and departed <WH3212> there. <WH8033>

And as one <WH259> of them opened <WH6605> his sack <WH8242> to give <WH5414> his ass <WH2543> provender <WH4554> in the inn, <WH4411> he espied <WH7200> his money; <WH3701> for, behold, <WH2009> it was in his sack's <WH572> mouth. <WH6310>

And he said <WH559> to his brothers, <WH251> My money <WH3701> is restored; <WH7725> and, see, <WH2009> it is even in my sack: <WH572> and their heart <WH3820> failed <WH3318> them, and they were afraid, <WH2729> saying <WH559> one <WH376> to another, <WH251> What <WH4100> is this <WH2063> that God <WH430> has done <WH6213> to us?
And they came <WH935> to Jacob <WH3290> their father <WH1> to the land <WH776> of Canaan, <WH3667> and told <WH5046> him all <WH3605> that befell <WH7136> to them; saying, <WH559>
The man, <WH376> who is the lord <WH113> of the land, <WH776> spoke <WH1696> roughly <WH7186> to us, and took <WH5414> us for spies <WH7270> of the country. <WH776>
And we said <WH559> to him, We are true <WH3651> men; we are no <WH3808> spies: <WH7270>

We be twelve <WH8147> <WH6240> brothers, <WH251> sons <WH1121> of our father; <WH1> one <WH259> is not, and the youngest <WH6996> is this day <WH3117> with our father <WH1> in the land <WH776> of Canaan. <WH3667>

And the man, <WH376> the lord <WH113> of the country, <WH776> said <WH559> to us, Hereby <WH2063> shall I know <WH3045> that you are true <WH3651> men; leave <WH5117> one <WH259> of your brothers <WH251> here with me, and take <WH3947> food for the famine <WH7459> of your households, <WH1004> and be gone: <WH3212>

And bring <WH935> your youngest <WH6996> brother <WH251> to me: then shall I know <WH3045> that you are no <WH3808> spies, <WH7270> but that you are true <WH3651> men: so will I deliver <WH5414> you your brother, <WH251> and you shall traffic <WH5503> in the land. <WH776>

And it came <WH1961> to pass as they emptied <WH7324> their sacks, <WH8242> that, behold, <WH2009> every man's <WH376> bundle <WH6872> of money <WH3701> was in his sack: <WH8242> and when both they and their father <WH1> saw <WH7200> the bundles <WH6872> of money, <WH3701> they were afraid. <WH3372>

And Jacob <WH3290> their father <WH1> said <WH559> to them, Me have you bereaved <WH7921> of my children: Joseph <WH3130> is not, and Simeon <WH8095> is not, and you will take <WH3947> Benjamin <WH1144> away: all <WH3605> these things are against <WH5921> me.

And Reuben <WH7205> spoke <WH559> to his father, <WH1> saying, <WH559> Slay <WH4191> my two <WH8147> sons, <WH1121> if I bring <WH935> him not to you: deliver <WH5414> him into <WH5921> my hand, <WH3027> and I will bring <WH7725> him to you again. <WH7725>

And he said, <WH559> My son <WH1121> shall not go <WH3381> down with you; for his brother <WH251> is dead, <WH4191> and he is left <WH7604> alone: <WH905> if mischief <WH611> befall <WH7122> him by the way <WH1870> in the which <WH834> you go, <WH3212> then shall you bring <WH3381> down <WH3381> my gray <WH7872> hairs with sorrow <WH3015> to the grave. <WH7585>
